page.title: 13FIRE FIGHTING APPLIANCES
page.content: There are 3 fire fighting appliances at the training school so that students can practise and learn how to deal with many types of fires. One has a hydraulic lift, which can reach a height of 54 feet when extended, and it has a powerful engine so that it can reach an aircraft fire very quickly as every second counts. Three separate types of{foam}are used as well as{water}which can be distributed through a cannon from the top of the vehicle. A distributor mounted at the front prevents a fire from getting underneath the vehicle. The school uses the most{modern {type of vehicles}which are used on airfields around the world, so that the recruits are familiar with the appliances they may be using when they finish the course and return home.
